tagline: Think. Move. Live in the UK.
hero.title: Bright Service Solution (BSS)
hero.subtitle: Free UK admission & visa support, plus security and cleaning job opportunities — in one trusted place.
home.vision.title: Our Vision
home.vision.body: To guide people planning to study, work, and build a better life in the UK — with clear support, honest advice, and real opportunities.
home.goal.title: Our Goal
home.goal.body: Remove barriers. Help you take the right steps. Make the process simple — from admission and visa guidance to job opportunities.
services.admission.title: UK Admission & Visa (FREE)
services.admission.body: We support international students with university admission guidance and visa application support at no cost. We work with Ulster University (Birmingham, London & Manchester), Coventry University, University of Birmingham, Birmingham College, and University of Wolverhampton.
services.security.title: Security (SIA Door Supervisor)
services.security.body: We connect eligible candidates with SIA Door Supervisor opportunities, explain requirements, and support you with the next steps.
services.cleaning.title: Cleaning Services & Jobs
services.cleaning.body: We provide cleaning services and connect job seekers with cleaning opportunities in residential and commercial environments.
